attributes.action: To support a State Visit invitation to President Trump. A true friend to Britain
attributes.additional_details: On his election campaign, he promised many things and was elected to enact them. He has started to fulfil those promises particularly in regard to his defence of his country against terrorists. This has naturally enraged sections of the community that do not necessarily support his promise to protect his countrymen.
attributes.background: President Trump has been democratically elected to be leader of the most powerful country in the free world. He believes in Britain as a free and independent country. He shares many of the values that we hold dear.
